DOC.brief_summary: The aim current study compare antiplatelet efficacy safety clopidogrel napadisilate clopidogrel bisulfate Coronary Artery Disease ( CAD ) patient coronary stent implantation .
DOC.brief_title: Korean Multicenter Randomized Controlled Trial ( RCT ) Pidogul Patients With Coronary Stenting
DOC.criteria: Korean men woman age 20 85 Patients diagnosed CAD Patients plan undergo PCI Patients treat PCI intend treat PCI fail Patients take take antiplatelet anticoagulant 2 week within prior 30 day Patients history alcohol abuse intoxication ; ( 4 ) hypersensitivity clopidogrel aspirin Patients hypersensitivity clopidogrel aspirin Patients abnormal laboratory result indicative liver disease Patients blood coagulation disorder , uncontrolled severe hypertension , active bleeding , history severe bleeding , intracranial hemorrhage ulcer bleed Patients pregnant , breastfeeding , use effective method contraception Patients contraindication study drug Patients participate another clinical study within 4 week prior start study
